TopicTitle: Game crashing on EVE,no crash report.

Articles.Content:
Hi,

My game keeps crashing when on EVE,the first time was when i was sending data while entering Eve's atmosphere while not having enough electric charge.The second time (and my current mission) is deploying parachutes on Eve,usually at around 15k (meters?) the game freezes and stops responding and then windows asks me to close it.

There are no crash reports other then old ones in the KSP folder,i can provide the save game file if someone wants to take a look (i have KER installed but i don't think it is causing the problem)

any more info i can provide or does someone have similar problems?

Edited May 29, 2015 by DCWarHound

...any more info i can provide...

Yup. Spec: logs.

Yup. Spec: logs.

Never mind,i solved it by turning down some graphic settings and turning off some effect.Also changed textures to half ress.
